name: Waiver of public auction requirements
text: The requirements of public auction may be waived when the appraised value of any vehicle is less than $250 as determined by the director of finance or authorized representative.  In that event the vehicle, after public advertisement has been made once in a newspaper of general circulation, may be disposed of in the same manner as when a vehicle is put up for public auction and for which no bid is received. [L 1949, c 194, pt of §1; RL 1955, pt of §138-32; am L 1967, c 267, pt of §1; HRS ; am L 1989, c 158, §4]
